cells.data:
I have been home for almost a month. I have been getting physical therapy two to three times a week. I have not been out of the house except for doctor visits.

Everyone says I am doing well. I have now managed over the last few days to get up out of bed on my own with some effort. 

Today I am very depressed as I can still do little on my own and can’t go anywhere. Today the tv went out in the living room, so my wife is spending time in our bedroom where I can’t go. This leaves me with hours alone.

I keep telling myself that this is temporary and how lucky I am as this could be much much worse. But still I am very unhappy about my situation, and two more months of this seems like an eternity.

I sleep very badly because I have to sleep on my back as I can’t turn over. I’m spending more and more time in a wheel chair, which I don’t care much for either. But that’s the breaks I guess.
